title: BUFFALO BILLS REPORT CARD: WEEK 5
text:

Each week, reporter Sal Maiorana rates the Bills' performance position-by-position. Rate them yourself, by clicking each game and then clicking the "your vote" title listed next to each position. 
Find all the previous scores and comments within the schedule and compare your ratings to the average of other users. 
Click here for the BILLS REPORT CARD . Bills cornerback Stephon Gilmore (24) celebrates after an interception sealed the win in Nashville. Christopher Hanewinckel-USA TODAY Sports Bills head coach Rex Ryan and Tennessee Titans head coach Ken Whisenhunt meet at midfield after a Bills win at Nissan Stadium. Christopher Hanewinckel-USA TODAY Sports Bills receiver Chris Hogan (15) celebrates after scoring the game-winning touchdown. Christopher Hanewinckel-USA TODAY Sports Bills cornerback Ronald Darby (28) celebrates after the win. Christopher Hanewinckel-USA TODAY Sports Bills quarterback Tyrod Taylor (5) reacts after a horse collar tackle by Tennessee Titans linebacker Zach Brown (55) during the second half. Christopher Hanewinckel, Christopher Hanewinckel-USA TODAY Sports Bills head coach Rex Ryan leaves the field after defeating the Tennessee Titans at Nissan Stadium. Jim Brown-USA TODAY Sports Bills safety Corey Graham (20) reacts after a penalty call during the second half against the Tennessee Titans. Christopher Hanewinckel-USA TODAY Sports Bills quarterback Tyrod Taylor (5) runs from pressure by Tennessee Titans linebacker Derrick Morgan (91) during the second half. Christopher Hanewinckel-USA TODAY Sports Bills cornerback Stephon Gilmore (24) comes up with an interception to seal the game as Tennessee Titans wide receiver Kendall Wright (13) lies injured on the turf. James Kenney, AP Buffalo Bills wide receiver Chris Hogan (15) reacts after his touchdown reception in the second half against the Titans. James Kenney, AP Bills wide receiver Chris Hogan (15) pulls in a touchdown reception in front of Tennessee Titans cornerback Coty Sensabaugh (24) in the second half. Weston Kenney, AP Buffalo Bills wide receiver Denarius Moore (17) fumbles under pressure from Tennessee Titans fullback Jalston Fowler (45) in the second half. Mark Zaleski, AP Buffalo Bills wide receiver Sammy Watkins sits on the bench with a towel on his head in the second half. Mark Zaleski, AP Titans running back Antonio Andrews (26) scores during the second half against the Buffalo Bills at Nissan Stadium. Christopher Hanewinckel-USA TODAY Sports Bills quarterback Tyrod Taylor (5) scores on a 22-yard touchdown run during the second half against the Tennessee Titans at Nissan Stadium. Christopher Hanewinckel-USA TODAY Sports Bills quarterback Tyrod Taylor (5) runs for a first down during the second half against the Tennessee TItans. Christopher Hanewinckel-USA TODAY Sports Bills quarterback Tyrod Taylor (5) reacts after being hit during the first half. Christopher Hanewinckel-USA TODAY Sports Titans defensive end Jurrell Casey (99) reacts after a defensive stop against Buffalo Bills quarterback Tyrod Taylor (5) during the first half at Nissan Stadium. Christopher Hanewinckel-USA TODAY Sports Bills running back Anthony Dixon (26) leaps to avoid the tackle by Tennessee Titans cornerback Jason McCourty (30) during the first half. Jim Brown-USA TODAY Sports Bills quarterback Tyrod Taylor (5) is hit hard after throwing the ball during the first half against the Tennessee Titans. Christopher Hanewinckel-USA TODAY Sports Titans kicker Ryan Succop (4) reacts after making a field goal during the first half. Christopher Hanewinckel-USA TODAY Sports Bills quarterback Tyrod Taylor (5) is sacked by Tennessee Titans defensive end Jurrell Casey (99) in the first half. Mark Zaleski, AP Bills cornerback Stephon Gilmore (24) upends Tennessee Titans running back Antonio Andrews. Weston Kenney, AP Titans receiver Kendall Wright (13) has a pass broken up by Buffalo Bills cornerback Stephon Gilmore (24) during the first half at Nissan Stadium. Christopher Hanewinckel-USA TODAY Sports Titans tight end Craig Stevens (88) is tackled after a reception during the first half. Christopher Hanewinckel-USA TODAY Sports Titans kicker Ryan Succop (4) reacts after kicking a field goal in the second quarter. Mark Zaleski, AP Titans quarterback Marcus Mariota (8) attempts to dive for the first down against Buffalo Bills defensive tackle Kyle Williams. Jim Brown-USA TODAY Sports Bills running back Boom Herron (38) rushes against the Tennessee Titans during the first half. Jim Brown-USA TODAY Sports Buffalo Bills running back Boom Herron (38) carries in the first half against the Tennessee Titans. Mark Zaleski, AP Bills quarterback Tyrod Taylor (5) prepares to pass in the first half against the Titans. Mark Zaleski, AP Titans quarterback Marcus Mariota hands off to running back Dexter McCluster (22) in the first half against the Bills. James Kenney, AP Tennessee Titans quarterback Marcus Mariota (8) passes in the first half. James Kenney, AP Titans running back Bishop Sankey (20) is tackled by Buffalo Bills strong safety Aaron Williams (23) in the first half. Mark Zaleski, AP Bills head coach Rex Ryan shakes hands with offensive guard Richie Incognito (64) before the game. Mark Zaleski, AP Bills quarterback Tyrod Taylor (5) warms up. Mark Zaleski, AP Buffalo Bills quarterback Tyrod Taylor warms up before the game. Mark Zaleski, AP Buffalo Bills head coach Rex Ryan arrives before the game against the Tennessee Titans Sunday, Oct. 11, 2015, in Nashville, Tenn. James Kenney, AP Buffalo Bills punter Colton Schmidt (6), long snapper Garrison Sanborn (65), kicker Dan Carpenter (2) and Tennessee Titans punter Brett Kern (6) talk before the game. Mark Zaleski, AP Mason Bollinger, 7, wears a Bills helmet as he watches players warm up. Mark Zaleski, AP Bills fans show their support and recall the "Music City Miracle" prior to the game against the Tennessee Titans. Jim Brown, Jim Brown-USA TODAY Sports Tennessee Titans quarterback Marcus Mariota (8) arrives at the stadium on Sunday. James Kenney, AP Bills fan Michael Lafferty prior to the game against the Tennessee Titans at Nissan Stadium on Oct. 11, 2015. Christopher Hanewinckel-USA TODAY Sports Bills head coach Rex Ryan talks with referee Walt Anderson (66) and side judge Greg Meyer before the game. Jim Brown-USA TODAY Sports Bills head coach Rex Ryan is all smiles prior to the game.
